input.content: Translate from English to Miskito: Is your father coming? — No, he is not coming here.

ideal: Aisikam aula ki? — Apia, witin nahara balras.

input.content: Translate from English to Miskito: She isn't sitting now, she is coming from there to here.

ideal: Nanara witin iwras, witin baha wina nahara aula.

input.content: Translate from Miskito to English: Yang nani dur ba yauhka kwakwaisna, bara man nani dimaisma.

ideal: We will open the door tomorrow, and then you will come in.
